sentences: Kuulake palun hästi, mida ma ütlen.
Lapsed peaksid vanemaid kuulama ja neiega koos töötama.
context: The Estonian word 'kuulata' primarily means 'to listen' or 'to hear'. It can also mean 'to obey' in certain contexts. The word is commonly used when referring to paying attention to what someone is saying, hearing sounds, or following instructions/commands. In the dictionary definition provided, it appears in the context of an erotic phone line where people call to listen to erotic conversations.
